I have version 2.0.5. Would it work if I just uninstall this one and setup 2.2.3 version?

@TalkingEvil

Not sure what you mean.

To use the program you just install it as usual then copy the contents of the crack folder into your installation folder so it will be something like:

Copy the files in: C:\Users\USERNAME\Downloads\Revo Uninstaller Pro 2.2.3 + crack -TrT\Revo Uninstaller Pro 2.2.3 + crack -TrT\Revo Uninstaller Pro 2.2.3 + crack -TrT\crack or wherever you downloaded the torrent and paste them into C:\Program Files\VS Revo Group\Revo Uninstaller Pro.

Hope this helps :)

I don't know about anyone else, but about the fifth or sixth time I used this I started getting messages that "this is not a genuine copy" from Revo. Yes, I had autoupdates turned off since the installation.

The file is good and I see no problem with the crack.

If it spams you that your copy is not genuine, just close the tab.

@TalkingEvil (and anybody else who might run into the same problem) ... if you unpack the cracked executable directly into your Revo Folder, it keeps it's Folders unless you specifically tell it not to, so your original executable doesn't get overwritten and that is why it asks you for a Serial Key ...

Hope that helps ...
